statements: SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, task_name FROM employee_schedule WHERE task_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, task_name, task_date FROM employee_schedule WHERE task_name = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY task_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT employee_name, task_name, task_date FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE task_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, task_date FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY task_date ASC, employee_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name FROM employee_schedule WHERE task_name LIKE '%report%';
SELECT count(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to = 2;
SELECT employee_name, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_name, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employees WHERE shift_start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT e.employee_name, t.task_name FROM employees e JOIN tasks t ON e.employee_id = t.assigned_to WHERE t.task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT e.employee_name, COUNT(t.task_id) AS task_count FROM employees e LEFT JOIN tasks t ON e.employee_id = t.assigned_to GROUP BY e.employee_name HAVING task_count > 0;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT task_description, deadline FROM tasks WHERE completed = false;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT task_description, deadline, employee_name FROM tasks t JOIN employees e ON t.assigned_employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE t.completed = FALSE ORDER BY deadline ASC, t.task_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position, COUNT(task_id) AS task_count FROM employees e LEFT JOIN tasks t ON e.employee_id = t.assigned_employee_id GROUP BY employee_name, position HAVING COUNT(task_id) > 3;
SELECT e.employee_name, s.start_date, s.end_date FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY s.start_date;
SELECT task_description, deadline, IF(completed, 'Done', 'Pending') AS status FROM tasks ORDER BY status ASC, deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT emp_name, emp_department FROM employees;
SELECT emp_name, emp_department FROM employees WHERE emp_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_description, task_assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE emp_department = 'IT';
SELECT emp_name, emp_department FROM employees WHERE emp_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT emp_name, task_description, start_date FROM employees JOIN assignments ON employees.emp_id = assignments.emp_id JOIN tasks ON assignments.task_id = tasks.task_id;
SELECT task_description, emp_name FROM tasks JOIN assignments ON tasks.task_id = assignments.task_id JOIN employees ON assignments.emp_id = employees.emp_id ORDER BY task_description ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_id FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT schedule_date, task_description FROM schedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_type FROM tasks WHERE task_type = 'Tech' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_tasks WHERE task_completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_role FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, t.task_name, et.task_completion_date FROM employees e JOIN employee_tasks et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN tasks t ON et.task_id = t.task_id;

SELECT e.employee_name, s.schedule_date, t.task_name FROM employees e LEFT JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id LEFT JOIN tasks t ON e.employee_id = t.task_id WHERE s.schedule_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.employee_name, COUNT(et.task_id) AS total_tasks FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_tasks et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_name HAVING total_tasks > 5;
